results.title: Different effects of metformin on hypothalamic-pituitary-thyroid axis activity in levothyroxine-treated and levothyroxine-naive women with non-autoimmune hypothyroidism.
results.text_hl: This case-control study was aimed at comparing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ action on hypothalamic-pituitary-thyroid axis activity between @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@-treated and @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@-naive @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with non-@<m>DISEASE_Thyroiditis_Autoimmune</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013967 @@@autoimmune thyroid hypofunction@@@.
